title: Spring truffle pithiviers with a Maderia reduction
description: Pithiviers are pretty French pies made with puff pastry. This version uses homemade pastry but you could use shop bought to save time.Equipment and preparation: You will need a piping bag with a plain nozzle.
ingredients: 250g/9oz butter, chilled and cut into pieces
1 free-range egg, separated and yolk lightly beaten
1 tbsp chopped fresh chervil, to garnish
